briefTitle: Acupuncture to Treat Cancer-Related Fatigue in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Acupuncture for Cancer-Related Fatigue in Breast Cancer Patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Localized breast cancer
* Average to above average fatigue
* Planning radiation therapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of acupuncture treatment
* Allergy to stainless steel
* Pacemaker
* Anticoagulant therapy
* Known bleeding disorder
* Metastatic breast cancer
* Seizure disorder
